name: Microsoft 6BA-00001 Wireless Optical Mouse
Features: [Comfort, Designed by ergonomic experts for comfort in either hand, with rubber grips featured on each side of the mouse., Snap-in Receiver, Plug in the snap-in receiver when you're ready to work, then snap it into your mouse when you travel, preserving battery life., 4 Buttons, Use the Back button to easily navigate folders or Web pages, and press the scroll wheel for AutoScroll., Battery Status Indicator, Red light indicates when your battery is running low., Magnifier, Point and click to enlarge and edit details using the Magnifier., High Definition Optical Technology, Microsoft High Definition Optical mouse products are more precise, more responsive, and deliver smoother tracking., Device Stage, Quickly and easily access common tasks, including product information, registration, settings and more for popular devices such as cell phones, cameras, printers, and mouse, keyboard and webcam products., Designed for Notebook PCs, Compact and comfortable, our handy notebook and laptop products are designed for convenience and mobility., Wireless Technology, Give yourself room to moveâ€”wireless mouse products let you work without worrying about tangled wires.]
